params.name: core_dev

working_version.name: working_version
working_version.comment: The version ID being worked on

params.comment: IN_DEV only. Store when the database schema was last synced.

params.name: mail_sentto
params.comment: The number of users the bulk mail has been sent to

params.name: mail_active
params.comment: Whether the bulk mail is currently active or not

params.name: mail_start
params.comment: Timestamp the bulk mail was created

params.name: mail_updated
params.comment: Timestamp last bulk mail batch was sent

frequency.name: frequency
frequency.comment: DateInterval specification for the frequency the task runs.

running.name: running
running.comment: Indicates if task is currently running (to prevent duplicate runs).

enabled.name: enabled
enabled.comment: Some tasks may set this automatically when they do/don't have things to do.

plugin.name: plugin
plugin.comment: The plugin ID number which owns the task.

app.name: app
app.comment: The application key which owns the task.

image_plugin.name: image_plugin
image_plugin.comment: The plugin ID, if created by a plugin

image_data.name: image_data
image_data.comment: Stores the image data so the images can be re-written if the file object is lost

template_parent.name: template_parent
template_parent.comment: This column holds the template_id of the original un-edited version of the template

template_edited.name: template_edited
template_edited.comment: Flag to indicate if there is a customized version of the template

params.name: css_hidden
params.comment: Skip this file when compiling

class.name: class
class.comment: Indicates the type of content that was reported

content_id.name: content_id
content_id.comment: The ID number of the content that was reported.

perm_id.name: perm_id
perm_id.comment: The ID number from the core_permission_index table which indicates who can view this report.

num_comments.name: num_comments
num_comments.comment: Number of comments moderators have made on this report.

first_report_by.name: first_report_by
first_report_by.comment: The ID number of the member who submitted the first report.

first_report_date.name: first_report_date
first_report_date.comment: Unix timestamp of when the first report was submitted.

last_updated.name: last_updated
last_updated.comment: Unix timestamp of the last time a comment or report was made (for read/unread marking)

author.name: author
author.comment: The ID number of the user who submitted the reported content.

params.name: set_logo_data
params.comment: JSON data of logo url, width, height

params.name: skin_version
params.comment: Human skin set version

params.name: set_long_version
params.comment: Integer version

params.name: set_version
params.comment: Human skin set version

params.name: app_update_version
params.comment: Json array of the latest version info returned by the update check URL

plugin_update_check_last.name: plugin_update_check_last
plugin_update_check_last.comment: Unix timestamp that the plugin was last checked for updates

plugin_update_check_data.name: plugin_update_check_data
plugin_update_check_data.comment: JSON data returned in last update check

plugin_diagnostic_url.name: plugin_diagnostic_url
plugin_diagnostic_url.comment: The URL to send diagnostic reports to.

type.name: type
type.comment: C for code, S for skin

plugin.name: plugin
plugin.comment: Plugin ID, if belongs to a plugin

app.name: app
app.comment: Application key, if belongs to app

params.name: set_update_check
params.comment: Remote URL to retrieve update data

params.name: set_update_last_check
params.comment: Unix timestamp of last check

params.name: set_update_data
params.comment: JSON update data retrieved from remote URL.

params.name: template_plugin
params.comment: The plugin ID, if created by a plugin

params.name: css_plugin
params.comment: The plugin ID, if created by a plugin

params.name: app_diagnostic_url
params.comment: The URL to send diagnostic reports to

item_class.name: item_class
item_class.comment: The class for the item the notification is about

item_id.name: item_id
item_id.comment: The ID number for the item the notification is about

sent_time.name: sent_time
sent_time.comment: Unix timestamp of the time the notification was sent.

read_time.name: read_time
read_time.comment: Unix timestamp of the time the notification was read.

notification_app.name: notification_app
notification_app.comment: The application that owns this type of notification

updated_time.name: updated_time
updated_time.comment: Unix timestamp of when the notification was last updated (or sent)

item_sub_class.name: item_sub_class
item_sub_class.comment: Item Sub Class for Comments and Reviews

location_key.name: location_key
location_key.comment: The editor location the content claiming this attachment has come from

id1.name: id1
id1.comment: Primary ID number for content claiming attachment

id2.name: id2
id2.comment: Secondary ID number for content claiming attachment

temp.name: temp
temp.comment: Temporary key for content claiming attachment

id3.name: id3
id3.comment: Arbitrary data for content claiming attachment

ad_location.comment: Stores the location for the advertisement to display
ad_location.name: ad_location

ad_images.comment: Stores a JSON array of images to use for this ad (small, medium and large)
ad_images.name: ad_images

ad_impressions.comment: The number of impressions for this ad, only tracked with image ads
ad_impressions.name: ad_impressions

ad_clicks.comment: The number of clicks for this ad, only tracked with image ads
ad_clicks.name: ad_clicks

ad_exempt.comment: JSON array of group IDs exempt from this ad
ad_exempt.name: ad_exempt

ad_maximum_value.comment: Maximum number of clicks or impressions allowed (for image ads only)
ad_maximum_value.name: ad_maximum_value

ad_maximum_unit.comment: Type of maximum value (for image ads only)
ad_maximum_unit.name: ad_maximum_unit

ad_html_https_set.comment: This column flags if https was "set", even if ad_html_https is empty
ad_html_https_set.name: ad_html_https_set

ad_member.name: ad_member
ad_member.comment: If created by Nexus, the customer ID

member.name: member
member.comment: The ID number of the member making the edit

time.name: time
time.comment: Unix timestamp of the date the edit was made

public.name: public
public.comment: Indicates if the log should display publicly

lang_key.name: lang_key
lang_key.comment: The language key to use for the result link

restriction.name: restriction
restriction.comment: If applicable, the ACP restriction key that should be checked for this result

app.name: app
app.comment: The application which owns the widget (if applicable)

plugin.name: plugin
plugin.comment: The plugin which owns the widget (if applicable)

class.name: class
class.comment: What type of widget is this? e.g. \IPS\Widget\StaticCache

caches.name: caches
caches.comment: JSON encoded array of cache keys to be referenced when deleting caches

restrict.name: restrict
restrict.comment: JSON array of owner app restrictions (e.g. core restricts to sidebar only, content restricts to IP.Content only)

default_area.name: default_area
default_area.comment: If no sidebar configuration is available for a page, all of the widgets for that app are loaded. This field determines which area on the page the default will show.

allow_reuse.name: allow_reuse
allow_reuse.comment: If 1, the widget can be re-used instead of having the block vanish from the manager's block list.

embeddable.name: embeddable
embeddable.comment: Determines if Pages can embed this widget in a custom block.

params.name: share_autoshare
params.comment: Flag to denote whether to show this service as an auto share option when creating content.

params.name: share_autoshare
params.comment: Flag to denote whether to show this service as an auto share option when creating content.

params.name: template_unique_key
params.comment: Unique key to ensure duplicates are not stored

params.name: css_unique_key
params.comment: Unique key to prevent duplicate records

params.name: g_post_polls
params.comment: Can create polls?

params.name: g_vote_polls
params.comment: Can vote in polls?

params.name: g_post_polls
params.comment: Can create polls?

params.name: word_app
params.comment: The application key, if word belongs to an application

leader_type.comment: Record is for member (m) or group (g)
leader_type.name: leader_type

index_object_id.name: index_object_id
index_object_id.comment: The ID of the object. pid for posts, tid for topics etc

index_item_id.name: index_item_id
index_item_id.comment: For comments and reviews, the ID of the item it pertains to. For \IPS\Content\Item this would just be NULL

index_container_id.name: index_container_id
index_container_id.comment: The id of the container for items/comments/reviews

index_permissions.name: index_permissions
index_permissions.comment: A comma-delimited list of groups which have permission to view

type.name: type
type.comment: C for code, S for skin
